item.title: Man sets fire to check-in area at Milan's Malpensa airport
item.description: The incident saw the partial evacuation of the terminal and may have a knock-on effect on departures.

item.title: Denmark scraps book tax to fight 'reading crisis'
item.description: The government hopes abolishing the sales tax will encourage more people to buy books.

item.title: German controversy surrounds jail term for transgender far-right extremist
item.description: Marla-Svenja Liebich was sentenced two years ago to a total of one year and six months in prison without parole.

item.title: Watch: Fire rages at Milan airport check-in desk
item.description: Footage shared on social media shows a man knocked to ground after smashing an advertisement screen.

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard revokes security clearances of 37 US intelligence officials
item.description: The director of national intelligence accuses the officials, who served under Biden and Obama, of politicising intelligence for partisan or personal g...
